rows.label: qst711601_msg0001
rows.name: Oh! That nasty article! Not nice!

rows.label: qst711601_msg0002
rows.name: Will friend listen to woes of Punpun?

rows.label: qst711601_msg0003
rows.name:
There was ferocious Crustip on
rampage... Oh woe is Punpun!

rows.label: qst711601_msg0004
rows.name:
Rotten monster set upon Punpun in
Punpun's special napping place!

rows.label: qst711601_msg0005
rows.name:
Punpun's blood boils with
desire for vengeance! Revenge!

rows.label: qst711601_msg0006
rows.name:
But Punpun has certain values that
prevent from taking up arms.
Peace-loving, nap-loving, and so on.

rows.label: qst711601_msg0007
rows.name:
But still, Punpun would
like to see grin wiped
from rude monster's face!

rows.label: qst711601_msg0009
rows.name:
Please take Punpun's place
and give monster's friends
right good drubbing!

rows.label: qst711601_msg0010
rows.name:
Monster not feel so tough when
little pals are done in. Will
reflect on error of ways!

rows.label: qst711601_msg0011
rows.name:
Would like friends to know name of
foul beast. Is Myrrhes Crustip!

rows.label: qst711601_msg0012
rows.name:
Punpun not like feeling of being
bested by beastly entity.

rows.label: qst711601_msg0013
rows.name:
And monster has many, many friends
in swampy lands around camp.

rows.label: qst711601_msg0014
rows.name:
Make mincemeat of three, and
Punpun can rest easy in bed
knowing justice been done.

rows.label: qst711601_msg0015
rows.name:
Punpun wait here safely and
ponder wonder of justice.
